Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கள்வார்க்குத் தள்ளும் உயிர்நிலை கள்வார்க்குத்தள்ளாது புத்தே ளுளகு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Even their body will fail the fraudulent; but even the world of the gods will not fail those who are free from fraud.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition. On the left, a fraudulent person ('கள்வார்க்கு') is shown. Their own physical body ('உயிர்நிலை') is failing them, depicted as their form becoming transparent, weak, and fading away ('தள்ளும்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, a person free from fraud ('கள்ளார்க்கு') is shown. They stand strong and solid. The entire world of the gods ('புத்தேள் உலகு'), represented by a beautiful, celestial city in the heavens, is shown to be a solid, reliable, and supportive foundation beneath their feet ('தள்ளாது').
Layered_Composition.Background: The fraudulent person stands on a crumbling, disappearing path. The honest person stands on a solid path of celestial light that extends down from the divine world to support them.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The ultimate contrast of fates: the fraudulent will be failed even by their own bodies, while the honest will find unwavering support from the very world of the gods.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The failing body of the thief contrasts with the solid, supportive celestial city for the honest. The world of the gods is not just a future destination but an active, present support for the virtuous.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Contrasting fates, ultimate ruin vs. ultimate support, divine justice.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left side is dark, fading, and desaturated. The right side is bathed in the brilliant, unwavering, golden light of the celestial world.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, epic, comparative shot that clearly displays the two opposing destinies.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with ethereal effects for the failing body and the celestial city.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Strong dualistic lighting: fading darkness vs. constant divine light.
